ygData.subject: Re: A trade skill question for the gallery.
ygData.msgSnippet: Careful there...in one room, there are three, usually 2 blues and a red, in the other, there are 5(?).  There are two standing alone in the area where you come
ygData.messageBody:
Careful there...in one room, there are three, usually 2 blues and a red, in
the other, there are 5(?). There are two standing alone in the area where
you come to them that are usually blue/black. The room with 5 I found it
almost impossible to lament without getting pounded. The room with
three...well, if you can lament the sidekicks AND kill the red, you should
be okay.

Good Luck
MacGrough
18th Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

p.s. watch for people dumping trains on you down there...died twice in the
spider rooms from it...

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, October 07, 1999 6:24 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A trade skill question for the gallery.


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Cool thanks they'd be perfect for levelling and gathering silk at 17th
then.
>Especially with my poison resistance of 60+ with Purifying Up.
>

>From: Donny Dane [mailto:ddane@...]
>Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 5:23 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] A trade skill question for the gallery.
>

>From: "Donny Dane" <ddane@...>
>
>Well,
>
>heart spiders were a mix of blues, yellows and reds to me at 16. So, I
>would guess 14 to 18 or so...
>haven't gone to look since 16th, but i would imagine most would be
>green/blue to me now.
>
>MacGrough
>18th Song Bard
>Solusek Ro Wanderers
>
